Sparsh Kumar, Shivam Rai, Ashutosh Chaubey: The team of CuNow. All we work in a team. We all are four members of strong programmer. We always work in the unity like a strong team. We all are the student of Chandigarh university of 1st year of CSE batch.
Welcome to Joltt,Your best companion of college
We have sent a verification link to your email please verify your account using that link and then press REFRESH button
We will send you password reset mail to your mail In case you didn\'t get/can\'t find it please check in JUNK FOLDER to.
Note: If you didn\'t recieve the mail please refer to junk or spam folder of your inbox.

Head of JOLTT : Prajjwal Dubey is the founder of JOLTT.where he oversees all functions of the business including engineering, product and operations. A designer at heart, Prajjwal is known for balancing sharp design thinking with thoughtful product strategy to create experiences that bring people together and encourage authentic communication to all over the world

Sparsh Kumar, Shivam Rai, Ashutosh Chaubey, Manish Yadav: The team of JOLTT. All we work in a team. We all are five members of strong programmer. We always work in the unity like a strong team. We all are the student of Chandigarh university of 3rd year of CSE batch.

a. JOLTT is a platform for users to post content, including photos, videos, comments, and other information. JOLTT provides social interactions between users who can post comments, likes, or other messages on a user\'s content. These interactions include direct messages between individual users, and disappearing messages. JOLTT\'s terms state they collect a broad range of personal information from people using the site, and about friends and contacts of people using JOLTT. JOLTT\'s terms state they use commercially reasonable safeguards to help secure a user\'s information collected through the service.

b. To use Platform (including to Process any Platform Data), you agree to these Platform Terms (“Terms”), as well as all other applicable terms and policies. This may include the H.I.N.D.U Terms of Service, the JOLTT Terms of Use, the H.I.N.D.U Commercial Terms, the Business Tools Terms, and any H.I.N.D.U Product terms that are applicable.
c. You must also comply with the applicable requirements in our Developer Policies and those made available on our Developer Site, including in our Documentation collectively, the “Developer Docs”)
